basic_info.description: My objective is to transition into either a data analyst position or front-end developer role. Bringing a diverse background in data analyst and committed to continous learning and embracing new challenges, I am actively seeking full-time opportunities in both data analysis and front-end roles.

projects.title: Movie Search Engine
projects.description: As one of my first projects during the Front-End developer bootcamp, I integrated HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a visually appealing and responsive website. Utilizing an API database, it provides an intuitive interface for users to search for films. Please note that due to its early stage of development, the site is currently not optimized for mobile devices.

projects.title: Caleo Cafe
projects.description: I teamed up with Caleo Cafe Angola to build a dynamic website tailored to their brand and customer needs. Through meticulous design, we crafted an intuitive platform that highlights their menu offerings and seamless ordering.

projects.title: Train Car Counter
projects.description: One of my first projects, I developed a straightforward train car counter application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The application allows users to increment the count of people in a train car with a click.
